TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program on sale at The Humble Store

Articles.Content:
<p><a href="http://bit.ly/1mrNSDn"><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/e00748a2fd1cc43cb26ba82859b77604/tumblr_inline_n5u8a1Bm5V1rr2wit.jpg"/></a></p>

<p><span>For 48 hours only, take 40% off of <em>Kerbal Space Program</em> during The <a href="http://bit.ly/1mrNSDn"><strong>HUMBLE STORE</strong></a>'s Spring Sale Review! Give yourself (and others, of course) the gift of <em>KSP</em> while supporting some fine causes at the same time.</span></p>
